original_text: Prepare your food like a cake that is made from barley. Bake it on a fire that you have made with human dung. Do this where the people can see you.’
korean_text: 너는 그것을 보리떡처럼 만들어 먹되 그들의 목전에서 인분 불을 피워 구울지니라

sentences.original_text: Prepare your food like a cake
that you have made with human dung
Do this where the people can see you
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 너를 볼 수 있는 곳에서 이것을 하라
